articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congolese Government Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congolese Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with the visiting Congolese government delegation led by Gakosso Jean Claude, minister of Culture and Art, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday. 
					 The Congolese minister recalled that President Kim Il Sung rendered positive support and cooperation to African countries including Congo.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Letter of Thanks of C.C., WPK to Soldier-builders
articles.content:
Letter of Thanks of C.C., WPK to Soldier-builders 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) sent a letter of thanks to commanding officers and soldier-builders of Unit 3154 of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces for successfully building the Okryu Children's Hospital as a monumental edifice in the era of the WPK.
					 They worked such a miracle as completing the hospital in a matter of a little over seven months since the ground-breaking by waging a high-pitched labor drive day and night.
					
					 They thoroughly implemented the WPK's idea of building all structures as required by the character and use of each building and its call for abiding by the principle of convenience first and architectural beauty next. As a result, they completed all facilities of the hospital in the best quality including the curative and treatment rooms and operation rooms to be convenient for the treatment of patients and children's living and impeccable in terms of architectural beauty.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the letter of thanks took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Pu Il and service personnel of the KPISF and medical staffs and employees of the hospital.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, conveyed it.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers recalled that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un attributed all successes to the soldier-builders, highly praised them for successfully completing the hospital till October 10, the anniversary of the WPK, through a drive for implementing the party's idea and upholding the party's policies and bestowed upon them such great honor as making sure that a letter of thanks of the C.C., WPK, was sent to them.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the commanding officers and soldier-builders had a photo taken against the background of the hospital built thanks to their patriotic devotion and creative wisdom.

articles.title: KPA Company Commanders, Political Instructors Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
KPA Company Commanders, Political Instructors Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing on Mansu Hill and at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces. 
					 They paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean IS Director's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean IS Director's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- At the information committee session of the "National Assembly" a few days ago, Nam Jae Jun who is director of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) of south Korea, referring to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, said that the north "vowed to reunify the country with use of force within three years". He even staged the farce of "testifying to such facts" as "test of propeller of a long-range missile", "replacement of over 44 percent of officers above army corps commander level" and "forward deployment of new-type multiple launch rocket system", giving impression that he got inside information about the DPRK.
					 The IS, in the meantime, spread a groundless story about "conditions in the concentration camps" with the use of human scum in a bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in information bulletin No. 1046 Thursday said:
					
					 This is aimed to highlight the IS's existence as an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, put down increasing public demand of the disbandment of the IS, tide over the puppet ruling crisis, escalate north-south confrontation and push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the extremes.
					
					 South Korea has now gone back to the days of the "yusin" regime when the "Central Intelligence Agency" was active.
					
					 The IS openly interferes in the puppet presidential elections, fakes up election results and commits such a bullying act as opening to the public the minutes of the north-south summit while getting hell-bent on clamping down on south Koreans including those calling for achieving reunification through alliance with the north.
					
					 Nam has taken the lead in these smear campaigns.
					
					 He was an ill-famed confrontation maniac who served Park Chung Hee's "yusin regime".
					
					 He is partly to blame for turning south Korea into the theatre of shambles and making the mess of the north-south relations.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is now having a hard time due to the last-ditch efforts of the IS coteries to maintain their existence.
					
					 The IS, which was fabricated to keep the dictatorial regime, has become a root cause of bringing misfortune to it.
					
					 The most typical example of this is the miserable end of the former "yusin regime".
					
					 There is a saying "Better to be alone than to have bad company." Park should fire Nam and disband the IS that has lived out its days, as demanded by the south Koreans before they bring bigger misfortune if she is really set to tide over the worsening political crisis and evade criticism at home and abroad  for deteriorating north-south ties. 
					
					 The unbiased public at home and abroad should look through the nature of the anti-DPRK racket kicked up by the present puppet regime and should not damage their own face by thoughtlessly echoing the anti-DPRK stories spread by the IS but lend an ear to the south Koreans calling for the disorganization of the IS and render active support to them.
					
					 The IS is bound to meet the most shameful end in the face of unanimous censure and denunciation by the south Korean people and the public at home and abroad.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves to Visit European Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves to Visit European Countries
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung left here on Thursday by air to visit European countries.

articles.title: Consortium to Invest in DPRK
articles.content:
Consortium to Invest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A consortium consisting of Jurong Consultants and OKP Holdings of Singapore, P＆T Architects ＆ Engineers Ltd. of Hong Kong, China and other well-known companies of the East Asia and the Middle East is taking part in developing projects in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The consortium agreed with the DPRK's related organs on collaboration in building the Kaesong Hi-Tech Industrial Park and Highway Toll Road from Capital Airport to Pyongyang City.
					
					 The projects will soon begin.

articles.title: Int'l Conference on SEZ Development Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Conference on SEZ Development Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Chol Sok, vice-president of the Korean Economic Development Association (KEDA), said in his closing address at the Pyongyang International Conference on Special Economic Zone (SEZ) Development that other countries' experience would be helpful to the DPRK seeking to create economic development zones in its localities.
					 The conference was held at the Yanggakdo International Hotel on October 16-17, with the attendance of KEDA officials, professors of Kim Il Sung University, University of National Economy, Academy of Social Sciences and other related institutions and economists of the DPRK and experts of academic and economic circles of different countries, including University of British Columbia in Canada, Chinese University of Hong Kong, University of Delhi in India, Planning & Economic Research in Malaysia and University of Wisconsin in the United States.
					
					 It focused on such matters as the features of SEZ planning and the study of its examples, management and investment in SEZ and development course of SEZ.
					
					 Its participants presented papers on experience and lessons of some countries and valuable propositions and exchanged their views on the prospect of SEZ development in the DPRK and international cooperation in this respect. 
					
					 Professor Pak Kyong Ae of University of British Columbia in Canada recalled that the conference was conducive to establishing and putting into practice the strategy of comprehensive economic development including the creation of SEZs. 
					
					 The professor hoped that the good ties forged between the participants through the conference would lead to continuous exchange.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Russian Orchestra
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Russian Orchestra 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia.
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Pavel Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Personal Message, Gift from Congolese President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Personal Message, Gift from Congolese President
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a personal message and gift from Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of the Republic of Congo.
					 They were conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday by Gakosso Jean Claude, minister of Culture and Art who is leading the visiting Congolese government delegation.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Congolese government delegation headed by Gakosso Jean Claude, minister of Culture and Art, and other foreigners visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them in deep reverence.
					
					 They went round with keen interest the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The guests made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 The head of the Congolese government delegation wrote that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il achieved great exploits for the era and mankind.

articles.title: Reception Given by German Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by German Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Thomas Schaefer, German ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday on the occasion of the national day of Germany.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and members of international bodies here.

articles.title: French Delegation Goes Back
articles.content:
French Delegation Goes Back
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the French Group for the Study of the DPRK of senate members from different parties went back home on Thursday. The delegation was led by Chairman Jean-Claude Frecon, senate member from the French Socialist Party.

articles.title: WHO Delegation Visits Various Parts
articles.content:
WHO Delegation Visits Various Places 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the World Health Organization (WHO) led by Samlee Plianbangchang, director of its Regional Office for South-East Asia, visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					 They went round various places of the institute successfully built as a comprehensive medical center and scientific research base for women.
					
					 They visited the library of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 They were impressed to see the library having all conditions for acquiring latest scientific and technological knowledge including e-reading room, computer lecture room, tele-education hall and room for scientific exchange.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Hyangsan County People's Hospital and other places.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday hosted a reception at his embassy on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials concerned. 
					
					 A staff member of the Cuban embassy was present there. 
					
					 The Cuban ambassador in his speech reiterated his will to boost the fraternal friendly ties between the two parties and peoples provided under the deep care of the preceding leaders.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would build a reunified thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the WPK. 
					
					 He expressed sincere hope on behalf of the Communist Party of Cuba and the Cuban government that the WPK, which represents all the ideals of the Korean people and socialism, would grow stronger in the future, too. 
					
					 Kim Yong Il said in his speech that the friendly relations between the two parties and two peoples of the DPRK and Cuba are the particular comradely relations which President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il forged with Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					 The friendly relations between the two parties and two countries will last forever as they were established and have steadily grown in the joint struggle for socialism against imperialism and the U.S., he noted, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK will extend invariable support and encouragement to the Cuban party and people in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution.

articles.title: DPRK Sportspersons Back Home from East Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Sportspersons Back Home from East Asian Games
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons of the DPRK came back home on Thursday after taking part in the 6th East Asian Games held in Tianjin, China. The games brought together thousands of players from countries and regions of East Asia. DPRK players bagged 8 gold medals, 12 silver medals and 22 bronze medals. 
					 They were warmly greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials in the sports field. 
					
					 Sportspersons put garlands around the necks of the players and coaches and gave bouquets to them, congratulating them on their successes.

articles.title: Families of Teachers, Researchers of Kim Il Sung University Continue to Move into New Flats
articles.content:
Families of Teachers, Researchers of Kim Il Sung University Continue to Move into New Flats
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The  twin high-rise apartment houses are wrapped in a festive mood every day as more families of teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University are moving into new flats.
					 Trucks carrying household goods arrived at the apartment houses one after another on Thursday. 
					
					 The families seem to hardly enter their new flats as they are what they imagined only in dreams. They were so happy and excited that they looked again and again at the furniture and household goods associated with the loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Head of a department Pak Sun Bong said in an excited tone:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un was like a father who wishes to provide as many as possible to them, and has shown all sorts of loving care for them, taking care of every aspect of their life. He is the tender-hearted father for all our people.
					
					  No educators will be happier than those of Juche Korea who are leading a worthwhile life under the warm loving care, being trusted by the great leader.
					
					 Researcher Ri Jung Man said: The great Generalissimos and the Marshal awarded to him the title of Labor Hero, highest honor of a citizen, and high state commendations and built such a deluxe flat for him even though he did what he should do as scientist. I will acquire more profound scientific and technological knowledge as required by the age of knowledge-based economy and positively solve scientific and technological issues arising in the building of an economic power and the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 Teacher Ko Ui Dok pledged as follows:
					
					 I will put my enthusiasm and soul into bringing up dependable revolutionary talents who would shoulder the future of the great Paektusan nation, cherishing deep in mind the great loving care shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 By doing so, I will devote my bit, small as it may be, to building a thriving socialist nation looked up by the world, most powerful and prosperous nation full of people's happiness.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Erected in Different Units of DPRK
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Erected in Different Units of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Mosaics "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" were erected in Hyangsan, Kosong, Pyokdong and Kangryong counties and at the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex and the Jaeryong Mine. The mosaics portray smiling President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il visited Hyangsan and Kosong, indicated the ways to be followed by the counties and made sure that Mts. Myohyang and Kumgang turned into world famous mountains and resting places for the people.
					
					 Visiting Pyokdong and Kangryong counties they turned the areas into places good to live in, and showed deep loving care for their people.
					
					 The complex and mine are associated with the leadership provided by them for the workers to effect a turn in the grand nature-harnessing project to provide eternal assets of the country and boost production of iron ore.
					
					 Officials and other people of Phihyon County erected in Chungryol-ri a mosaic portraying tender-hearted Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk taking students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School in their arms. 
					
					 Ceremonies for unveiling the mosaics took place at relevant units.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean Peninsula has entered a touch-and-go phase due to the U.S. and the puppet south Korean warmongers' reckless attempt to provoke a nuclear war against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Some days ago the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington sailed into the West Sea of Korea after taking part in the U.S.-Japan-south Korea combined naval exercises in the East and South Seas of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet warmongers had staged several war maneuvers targeting the DPRK with the involvement of nuclear carriers in waters off the Korean Peninsula. But it is something unprecedented that the carrier was sent even to the West Sea of Korea, the biggest hotspot, for another round of war drills.
					
					 This dangerous nuclear war attempt clearly shows the U.S. assertion that it has neither hostile policy toward the DPRK nor intention to attack it is a trick to deceive the public at home and abroad.
					
					 In this regard, Kim In Chol, a department director of the DPRK Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, told KCNA:
					
					 Not content with the division of the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. has annually staged all sorts of war games for several decades, shipping into south Korea huge military equipment for attack on the DPRK.
					
					 To cope with such grave situation, the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrence to defend itself.
					
					 It is quite natural for the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to maintain the stand for countering the U.S. nuclear threat with self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Ri Yu Song, officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 It is ridiculous that the U.S. thinks it can frighten our army and people with its nuclear carrier.
					
					 We, servicepersons, are ready to blow up the U.S. mainland as well as its nuclear carriers if it dares infringe upon our territory even a bit.

articles.title: DPRK's Medicine Maker Scores Big Deal in Trade Fair
articles.content:
DPRK's Medicine Maker Scores Big Deal in Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Korea Mangyong Sogam Trading Corporation, a maker of Koryo medicines and health foods, has scored a big deal at the 9th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair held on September 23-26.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Paek Jong Muk, director of the corporation:
					
					 Some of the products we are making were awarded the state's GMP authentication and registered by the World Intellectual Property Organization.
					
					 All of the products are made with natural medicinal herbs.
					
					 The corporation equipped with up-to-date facilities majors in developing varieties of Koryo medicines and health products of the world's standard.
					
					 Among them are Angunguhwanghwan, efficacious for first-aid analeptic, Uhwangchongsimwon, especially good for various cerebral apoplexies, Kyongokhwan, effective for asthenia and Sipjondaebohwan, the best tonic as a haematic. 
					
					 Capsules and tablets have also won high appreciation as remedies for diabetes, neuralgia and heart diseases.
					
					 The corporation also manufactures health products, including pine pollen in honey and wild berries in honey.
					
					 Its products are mainly composed of extracts produced on the basis of Tonguibogam (Encyclopedia of Traditional Medicine of Korea).

articles.title: DPRK's Rapid Development in Weightlifting Event
articles.content:
DPRK's Rapid Development in Weightlifting Event
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- In recent years weightlifters of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have made good results in international tournaments.
					 The DPRK won three gold and one other medals in the weightlifting event of the 2012 London Olympiad and 28 medals, including 15 gold medals, in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship. It also obtained 149 medals, 80 gold medals included, in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship, topping the standings of countries.
					
					 Its weightlifters emerged winners in women's 63 kg and 69 kg categories of the 6th East Asian Games held in Tianjin of China recently.
					
					 In the London Olympiad Kim Un Guk set a new world record in the men's 62 kg with a lift of 327kg in total and Om Yun Chol a new Olympic record in the men's 56 kg clean-and-jerk event by lifting 168 kg.
					
					 As regards such good results of DPRK weightlifters in the Olympiad, the Associated Press (AP) said that their successes were attributable to supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who gave courage and strength to them.
					
					 China's Xinhua said that DPRK's good results were not a surprise and its athletes have regarded it as their duty to give pleasure to their supreme leader Kim Jong Un with sports success.
					
					 Referring to DPRK's results in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship, an international weightlifting referee of China said:
					
					 "I never expected that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, came to watch competitions in the championship. As he pays deep attention to the sports development of the country, its weightlifting will further develop."
					
					 A Chinese weightlifting coach said the DPRK has rapidly developed in weightlifting in recent years, stressing that it would take the world weightlifting supremacy in a few years to come, thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's deep care.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Red Herring
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Red Herring
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea is running the whole gamut of red herrings, feeling guilty conscience after the publication of the statement of the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in denunciation of its acts of treachery. 
					 The spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea, conservative politicians and reptile papers vied with each other to claim that their "sincere efforts" for confidence-building between the south and north were seriously hamstrung and they did nothing wrong. 
					
					 This is nothing but a poor excuse of those traitors who have nothing to complain about the north's just position and warnings as the statement hit the nail on their heads. But we cannot but question them. 
					
					 Does the Park group have the face to talk about "confidence?"
					
					 It is none other than the Park's group which has gone mad with the moves to stifle fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces in violation of the basic principle and idea of reconciliation and peaceful reunification which were agreed upon by the north and the south and fully supported and approved by all Koreans. 
					
					 It was Park Geun Hye who was more vocal about "confidence" and "principle" than anybody else. 
					
					 During the "election campaign" late in December last year she let loose a whole string of rhetoric that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration should be respected and confidence could not be built without it, claiming that she was "different" from the preceding regime.
					
					 As soon as she came to power, however, she fostered distrust, confrontation and extreme danger of war on the basis of self-righteousness and hypocrisy, far from adhering to the principle of confidence and respect. 
					
					 Through the "principal plan for the development of south-north relations" she declared the abrogation of the joint declarations of the nation. 
					
					 She launched large-scale war exercises in the wake of the formal confirmation of the "tailored deterrence strategy" aiming at a preemptive nuclear attack on fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 Her group's mud-slinging at the dignity of the supreme leadership as dear as the life and soul of the Korean people and the social system in the DPRK is something unprecedented. Accordingly, the world people are stunned by this backbiting. 
					
					 This amounts to the self-admission of the fact that Park's oft-repeated "confidence" and "principle" are nothing but hypocrisy and an empty talk and they are aimed at "the change of the social system" in the DPRK and "its collapse." 
					
					 A politician should be trustworthy and consistent in behavior among other things. 
					
					 Who will believe the "head of state" whose demeanor changes just a few months later? 
					
					 As a matter of fact, Park has around her only despicable politicians who are little short of migratory birds and parasites who behave depending on the situation so as to serve those in power. She has neither force nor people whom she can truly trust and count on. 
					
					 It is long since the people of south Korea turned their backs on the Park group which has met its own interests through such illegal actions as the "Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election" and hypocritical commitments. 
					
					 Even her confidants are breaking with her one after another in protest against her unpredictable caprice and perfidy. 
					
					 As people of various circles in south Korea comment, the present regime finds itself in the worst political crisis. An opposition party said that it is an "extreme political chaos" produced by Chongwadae's inability, self-righteousness and acts of reneging on commitments, adding Park Geun Hye is to blame for it. 
					
					 Gloomy is the future of the turkey-like politician. 
					
					 Park would be well advised to properly know that she will be disqualified to remain as a member of the nation, far from being a politician, if she persistently fools public and mocks at the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of DIU Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DIU Marked 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here on Thursday editorially mark the 87th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). 
					 Rodong Sinmun says in its editorial the formation of the DIU by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 17, Juche 15 (1926) was a historic declaration of the start of the Korean revolution of a new type and an epoch-making event which brought a radical turn in hewing out the destiny of the Korean people. 
					
					 After the formation of the DIU the Korean revolution could traverse the road of independence with a clear-cut target and strategy of the struggle and the Korean people could carve out their destiny by their own efforts, being responsible for it as a driving force of history, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 More than eight decades of the Korean revolution are a proud history in which the Korean people have advanced winning victory after victory under the banner of independence, Songun and socialism held high by the DIU. 
					
					 It is the long-term strategy of the Korean revolution to keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism. All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are carrying forward the sacred soul and strong spirit of the DIU. 
					
					 The DPRK displayed its might as an invincible political and military power and socialist bulwark and a solid foundation for the eternal prosperity of the nation was laid in the eras of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are making a new history of Songun Korea under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Unshakable is the faith of the party, army and people of the DPRK to carry forward the history and tradition of the DIU, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The editorial calls on all the party members, service personnel and people to share the idea and intention with Kim Jong Un to the last, bearing in mind the immutable truth that to remain true to his Songun leadership is the way of glorifying generation after generation the sacred history and tradition of the Korean revolution which started from the DIU.
					
					 The historical cause of the DIU is sure to triumph thanks to the service personnel and people who are intensely loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and firmly united in single faith and will. 
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial says that victory and glory are always in store for the army and people of the DPRK carrying forward the great tradition of the DIU under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorial System in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorial System in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- October 17, 1972, when the cursed "yusin" system was proclaimed, was a disgraceful day for the south Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "October yusin" that left the whole gamut of crimes in history was a politically-motivated coup Park Chung Hee committed to establish long-term dictatorial system.
					
					 The blood-stained "yusin" dictatorship left wound in the minds of the south Koreans that can never be healed.
					
					 Tragedy is that the cursed nightmare is being revived in south Korea. 
					
					 From long before taking office the conservative group asserted that "October yusin" was an inevitable and best option, openly lauding the crimes committed in the era of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 As soon as they took office, they emitted venoms to turn south Korean society into the land of darkness ruled by fascist dictatorship just the way the "yusin" dictator did.
					
					 The confrontation between progressives and conservatives has reached the worst phase and the south Korean people's expectation and hope for democracy and justice have been ruthlessly dashed. 
					
					 This shuddering situation in south Korea bears a close resemblance to the past era of "yusin" dictatorship notorious for its terror-ridden politics.
					
					 Furthermore, owing to the conservative group's sycophancy toward the U.S. and moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots the south Korean people's dignity has been harshly trampled down and big hurdles lie in the road of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group has resorted to undisguised moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots while viciously hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK, thus doing away with the hard-won opportunity of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They also introduced into south Korea means for a preemptive nuclear attack and staged madcap nuclear war drills against the DPRK, posing a serious threat to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The cursed history of the "yusin" fascist dictatorship is being repeated in south Korea, an unbearable humiliation for the broad spectrum of south Koreans who have carried on dynamic actions for democracy.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Flailed for Suppressing Progressive Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Flailed for Suppressing Progressive Organization
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea issued a statement on Tuesday to denounce the puppet authorities for cracking down on the Teachers Union.
					 The statement accused the Park Geun Hye regime of threatening to deprive the union of its qualifications unless it revises its internal rules in such a manner as to divest the dismissed of the qualifications as unionists.
					
					 The recent action of the present regime is aimed at removing hurdles lying in the way of distorting history and embellishing dictatorship in the field of education in a bid to conceal inglorious history of its pro-Japanese ancestors, it noted.
					
					 It said the people will turn out as one in the actions to put an end to the suppression of the Teachers Union and realize genuine education in order to terminate the distortion of history and achieve democracy.

articles.title: Solidarity with Actions for Democracy Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solidarity with Actions for Democracy Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- An editorial calling upon people from all walks of life to achieve solidarity with actions for democracy was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Monday.
					 The editorial accused the Intelligence Service and the "Saenuri Party" of evading the blame for the IS's interference in the election, threatening to open to public the voice data on the minutes of the south-north summit.
					
					 It assailed the regime for not only refusing to honor  any commitment to the people's living but reacting to the people's demand for the guarantee of their vital rights by cracking down upon them.
					
					 Such situation calls upon all democratic forces to get united as one and achieve all-people solidarity, it held.

articles.title: Measles Occur in S. Korean Kangwon Province
articles.content:
Measles Occur in S. Korean Kangwon Province
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Several measles cases  were reported from the Cholwon area of south Korean Kangwon Province, according to south Korean KBS on Tuesday.

articles.title: 65th Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Russia Marked in Russia
articles.content:
65th Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Russia Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place on October 11 in Vladivostok, Russia on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display were photos documenting immortal exploits of the great Generalissimos and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talent of the Korean people.
					
					 Present there were figures of the Maritime Territory Administration and its Legislative Assembly, the Vladivostok City Administration, the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party, the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the "A Just Russia", the Pacific Sea Fleet of Russia and masses and the DPRK consul general to Nakhodka and staff members of the consulate general.
					
					 The participants firstly looked round the exhibits and watched a Korean film documenting leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to the Far Eastern Region of Russia.
					
					 Vice-director of the Bureau for International Cooperation and Tourism of the Maritime Territory Administration said that the relations between the peoples of the two countries are developing on the basis of friendship and mutual respect, adding that he hoped for developing the dialogue and cooperation between the two countries in line with the new and realistic requirement.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula will be surely accomplished by the Juche idea and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea and the heroic struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 It was followed by the performance given by members of the DPRK mission and Russian performers.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Opened in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Opened in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition opened in Ulan Bator on October 10 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibition were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The venue of the exhibition presented fantastic scenery with at least 300 flowers in full bloom.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were figures of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions including the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Ministry of Defence, the Mongolian People’s Party, the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies, the Kimjongilia Association, the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun and the Political and Business School of Mongolia and masses.
					
					 The minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism said:
					
					 Mongolia and the DPRK have long-standing friendly relations.
					
					 The Mongolian people are sincerely pleased that the Korean people are achieving great successes in the efforts to build a rich and powerful country under the guidance of their leader.
					
					 Kimjongilia is really a beautiful flower.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop in the future.
					
					 The former Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK said that Kimjongilia is the most beautiful of the flowers, adding it is fascinating and attractive, indeed.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun said:
					
					 Seeing Kimjongilia while visiting the DPRK several times, I was completely enchanted by its beauty.
					
					 I am greatly excited to see such wonderful flower in full bloom in the land of Mongolia.
					
					 The flower will be cherished in the hearts of the Mongolian people along with the august name of Kim Jong Il, the great man.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Enjoyment of Performance Given by Russian Orchestra Reported in Russia, China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Enjoyment of Performance Given by Russian Orchestra Reported in Russia, China 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- It was reported in Russia and China on Wednesday that Marshal Kim Jong Un enjoyed the performance given by the Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia.
					 ITAR－TASS and Voice of Russia reported the news in detail, saying that DPRK leader Kim Jong Un enjoyed the performance given by the orchestra.
					
					 The Chinese People's Daily said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Un was greeted by the head and chief conductor of the orchestra and the administrative manager of the orchestra.
					
					 He warmly welcomed the DPRK visit of the orchestra and had a cordial talk with the guests.
					
					 He congratulated them on their successful performance.
					
					 He met the leading members of the orchestra and thanked them for presenting a splendid performance to the delight of the Korean people.
					
					 The Chinese Hong Kong Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD aired the same news.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Observed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Oct. 2 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has steered the Korean revolution as an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and as the general staff of the revolution, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is working heart and soul to develop the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK has waged a resolute struggle against all sorts of unsound ideological elements such as modern revisionism, flunkeyism and dogmatism and is advancing under the uplifted banner of the red flag of revolution, frustrating the anti-socialist moves of the hostile forces.
					
					 It has also made shining achievements in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 Great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as an eternal banner of victory not only for the Korean people but for progressive humankind struggling for global independence.
					
					 The WPK is now waging a dynamic struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the WPK led by him.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism published its bulletin titled "Ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea" on October 7 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The bulletin introduced the victorious and glorious history of the WPK highly praised by the world people as the experienced and tested invincible party and the mother party guided by President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bulgaria, Pakistan and Brazil on October 7 and 9 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were figures of political parties, organizations and organs of relevant countries including the Bulgarian Socialist Party, Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, Pakistan Trade Union Federation, Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and a college in Brasilia City of Brazil, as well as masses.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said that the WPK developed into a revolutionary party protecting the interests of broad strata of toiling people under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and has always advanced along the road of victory and glory.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success under the leadership of the WPK headed by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said that the Korean people are working world-startling miracles in all fabrics of social life as they are led by Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers including the principal of a college in Brasilia City of Brazil praised the immortal exploits performed by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Bulgaria and Pakistan.

articles.title: DPRK's Cause of Reunification Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Cause of Reunification Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on October 1 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that the publication of the declaration under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il was a historic event of great significance in the movement for the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime has persisted in its hostile acts against the DPRK and moves against reunification in utter denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, it said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK took bold measures for dialogue and peace despite the heinous provocations and plots of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 They, however, are not only malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system but kicking up a fascist repressive campaign against the progressive pro- reunification patriotic forces in south Korea.
					
					 We voice unequivocal support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to implement the October 4 declaration under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The cause of Korea's reunification is sure to triumph under the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Libya-DPRK Friendship Association Formed
articles.content:
Libya-DPRK Friendship Association Formed
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was formed in Tarabulus on October 10.
					 The acting secretary general of the Sunbula International Friendship Club was elected chairman of the association at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the association praised President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for turning the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party and developing the DPRK into a political and military power no formidable enemies dare provoke.
					
					 They pledged to make positive contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Foreign Media Report Statement of NDC Spokesman
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report Statement of NDC Spokesman
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported on Oct. 12 and 13 the statement "If the U.S. is truly concerned about the improvement of the relations with the DPRK, it should withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK first" made by the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 The foreign media included the Russian Interfax, Voice of Russia, NTV, Russian papers Vechernyaya Moskva and Kommersant, Chinese internet homepages, the Syrian SANA and TV broadcasting services, the Thai Bangkok Post, the Lebanese paper Al-Joumhouria, the Kuwait Times, the Turkish paper Zaman, Egyptian papers Al Ahbar, the Egyptian Gazette, CTK of the Czech Republic, the British paper Times, the French paper Figaro, the Uruguayan paper La Juventud and the Washington Post. 
					
					 They carried the full text or gist of the statement, saying that the DPRK clarifies principled stand towards relations with the U.S., the DPRK says it continues to make efforts for the denuclearization of the peninsula and the DPRK warns of a total war.

articles.title: Beijing Daily Introduces Successes of DPRK Sportspersons
articles.content:
Beijing Daily Introduces Successes of DPRK Sportspersons
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Beijing Daily on Oct. 11 introduced successes made by DPRK athletes in the 6th East Asian Games.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The women's soccer matches of the 6th East Asian Games ended on Oct. 11.
					
					 The DPRK team defeated its Japanese rival 2-0 in the final to win the title by winning the three consecutive matches.
					
					 In Olympiad and other games, DPRK sportspersons showed not a few impressive scenes.
					
					 Rim Jong Sim, winner of the gold medal of the Olympiad in the women's 69kg category, set a new record of the games in the weightlifting event on Oct. 8.
					
					 In the meantime, Kim Un Ju, woman weightlifter, won the title in the 75kg category.
					
					 In recent years the DPRK sportspersons have proved successful in international games.
					
					 The DPRK football team took part in the 2010 World Cup and weightlifters and judoists bagged four gold medals in the London Olympics.
					
					 Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong won the victory in the mixed doubles of the world table tennis championship held this year.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Carried by Bulletin of Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Carried by Bulletin of Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the bulletin of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria on October 10.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portaaviones nuclear norteamericano "George Washington", que participo en los ejercicios  maritimos conjuntos de Estados Unidos-Japon-Sur de Corea en el Mar Este y Sur de Corea, aparecio el dia 12 en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos realizaron hasta la fecha en varias ocasiones los ejercicios militares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea introduciendo el portaaviones nuclear en el area maritima de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Pero, esta vez lo introdujeron hasta en el Mar Oeste, zona muy candente, tras terminarlos en el Mar Este y el Sur.
					
					El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP), en su declaracion fechada el 16, senalo que esto siendo una peligrosa maquinacion encaminada a  agravar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico y desatar la guerra nuclear,  demuestra que tales maniobras de EE.UU. y la banda titere han llegado a la etapa mas peligrosa.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda de los titeres surcoreanos revelan abiertamente el intento de ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC luego de haber trazado el guion de guerra nuclear como la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" e introduciendo el portaaviones nuclear en la cercania de la RPDC, debido a lo cual se ha creado en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion muy tirante y no se sabe cuando se estallaria la  guerra.
					
					El hecho demuestra que la "no agresion" y la "desnuclearizacion" de que hablan ellos son el engano para ocultar su intento de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					La situacion dada muestra claramente que los autores que traen en la Peninsula Coreana el peligro de guerra nuclear y agravan la tension de la region del Nordeste Asiatico son EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Sus maquinaciones de guerra nuclear muestran cuan justa era la posesion del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC y nos hace redoblar la decision de intensificarlo con mas firmeza.
					
					La RPDC desea la paz, pero no perdonara jamas las peligrosas maquinaciones de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Si ellos desatan por fin la guerra anti-RPDC, en contrapelo de repetidas advertencias de esta,  el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea castigaran implacablemente a los agresores y provocadores.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda titere deben darse clara cuenta de que las imprudentes provocaciones adelantaran su tragico fin y actuar con prudencia.
					
					Todos los connacionales del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar deben levantarse activamente en la lucha por frustrar las criminales maquinaciones de provocacion de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos.

articles.title: Secretariado de CRPP denuncia al presidente de SNI de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Secretariado de CRPP denuncia al presidente de SNI de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, en la sesion del comite de informaciones de "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea, Nam Jae Jun, presidente titere del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia, al denigrar la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dijo que el Norte (de Corea) "declaro lograr dentro de 3 anos la reunificacion por fuerzas armadas". Ademas Nam hizo "testimonio" como si conociera las informaciones internas de la RPDC hablando de la "prueba del cuerpo propulsor de misil de largo alcance", "cambio de 44% de los jefes de cuerpo del ejercito para arriba" y la "ubicacion avanzada de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsores de ultima moda".
					Por otra parte, los compinches del SNI lanzaron a las escorias humanas para difundir los datos demagogicos como el "estado de campos de concentracion" con intencion de difamar la RPDC.
					
					En su informacion no. 1046 publicada este jueves, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) condeno que tal proceder parte del intento de calmar la cada dia mas creciente demanda de disolucion de SNI en el suelo surcoreano dando destaque al valor de su existencia, recuperar la crisis de gobernacion titere y llevar a la fase mas catastrofica la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al exacerbar mas la confrontacion intercoreana, y continuo:
					
					Ahora, el Sur de Corea retorna al tiempo de "Servicio Central de Inteligencia" del pasado "gobierno de Yusin".
					
					Los gangsteres del SNI inventan el resultado electoral al intervenir abiertamente en las elecciones presidenciales titeres, se atreven a dar a publicidad el registro de la cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea y se enfrascan a la represion contra las fuerzas de reunificacion en alianza con el Norte y otros habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					En la delantera de esas locuras se encuentra su cabecillo Nam Jae Jun.
					
					Siendo retirado del "poder de renovacion" de Park Chung Hee, Nam es el infame maniaco conflictivo.
					
					Precisamente por el, el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en caos y las relaciones intercoreanas se empeoran mas.
					
					Debido a los esfuerzos desesperados de los integrantes del SNI por mantener su existencia, Park Geun-hye cae mas en aprieto.
					
					Historicamente, el SNI, fabricado para mantener el "poder" dictatorial, fue la causa de todas las desgracias del "poder". Lo comprueba el fin tragico del pasado "poder de renovacion".
					
					Para salvarse de la crisis politica en peor y evadir las denuncias del interior y exterior por haber fracasado las relaciones N-S, Park Geun-hye debe destituir a Nam y disolver el SNI en agonia de acuerdo con la demanda de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Las imparciales opiniones publicas del interior y exterior no deben repetir al pie de la letra los datos fraudulentos anti-RPDC inventados por los gangsteres del SNI tras distinguir correctamente la verdadera naturaleza de los alborotos intrigantes anti-RPDC y prestar oido a las voces de los habitantes surcoreanos que exigen la disolucion del SNI y solidarizarse con esa demanda.
					
					El SNI no evitara la mas ignominiosa destruccion por la condena y rechazo unanimes de la poblacion surcoreana y la opinion publica  interna y externa.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion congolena
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion congolena
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 17 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Congo encabezada por Gakosso Jean Claude, ministro de Cultura y Arte, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion, el visitante recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung brindo activo apoyo y cooperacion a su pais y otros paises africanos.
					
					Subrayo que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta personal y regalo de presidente de Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta personal y regalo de presidente de Congo
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta personal y regalo que le dirigiera Denis Sassou-Nguesso, presidente de la Republica de Congo.
					Gakosso Jean Claude, ministro de Cultura y Arte, quien preside la delegacion gubernamental de visita en Corea, los entrego el dia 17 a Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.

articles.title: Consorcio internacional de Economia toma parte en desarrollo de objetos de RPDC
articles.content:
Consorcio internacional de Economia toma parte en desarrollo de objetos de RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Consorcio Internacional de Economia compuesto por las empresas de Asia Oriental y del Oriente Medio afamadas en el mundo inclusive la compania Jurong y la de Bienes Inmuebles OKP, de Singapur, la compania limitada P＆T de Hong Kong de China y otras, acordo cooperar con las unidades correspondientes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la construccion de la zona de desarrollo de la tecnologia de punta de Kaesong y de la autopista de peaje entre el Aeropuerto de Pyongyang y la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					El consorcio iniciara pronto su trabajo.
